akas: The Word: Rise of the Slam Poets (original title)
akas from release info: The Word: Rise of the Slam Poets (original title)
imdb.plot outline: THE WORD: RISE OF THE SLAM POETS is a six-part web series about contemporary Australian slam poetry featuring leading young poets from diverse cultural backgrounds. Blending documentary, art and video poetry, this series paints a powerful portrait of multicultural Australia from a generation that has rediscovered the power of the spoken word.
imdb.title: The Word: Rise of the Slam Poets
plot: THE WORD: RISE OF THE SLAM POETS is a six-part web series about contemporary Australian slam poetry featuring leading young poets from diverse cultural backgrounds. Blending documentary, art and video poetry, this series paints a powerful portrait of multicultural Australia from a generation that has rediscovered the power of the spoken word.
